main.description: Here you can get acquainted with my portfolio, view my projects, learn about me and my technology stack.

about.aboutDescription: My name is Rustem. I am from the Republic of Tatarstan - Russia, the city of Kazan . Mastered html css js well and continued to work as a freelancer, after which he began collaborating with several companies on outstaff . After that, I started regularly studying react, redux-toolkit, typescript, various libraries and animations, and improving my skills
